name: Grump High - a game grumps dating sim
name_original: Grump High - a game grumps dating sim
description:
This is a Game Grumps dating sim (feat supermega + a secret supermega ending ;)). This is my first time making a visual novel so I decided to make it as dumb as possible. All misspellings and grammar mistakes are on purpose! 

Supermega/Game Grumps: if you are reading this...I would love to see you play my game, I think it would be absolutely hilarious. Also my mom mentioned she would also love to see you guys play it. 

Anyways I hope anyone who plays this has a good laugh. :)
